entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
